name: 語言學概論
description: This course will provide students basic knowledge of different domains in linguistics, which include the knowledge of general linguistics (phonetics, phonology, morphology, syntax, semantics, and pragmatics), the knowledge of psycholinguistics, and the knowledge of sociolinguistics. That is, students will learn IPA, and how to analyze the morphological and syntactic structures of certain languages in the world. In addition, they will learn the relationship between brain and language and its relevant research methods and technologies. Preparation before each class and review thereafter is strongly recommended for students who attend this course.

**課程簡介**

This course will provide students basic knowledge of different domains in linguistics, which include the knowledge of general linguistics (phonetics, phonology, morphology, syntax, semantics, and pragmatics), the knowledge of psycholinguistics, and the knowledge of sociolinguistics. That is, students will learn IPA, and how to analyze the morphological and syntactic structures of certain languages in the world. In addition, they will learn the relationship between brain and language and its relevant research methods and technologies. Preparation before each class and review thereafter is strongly recommended for students who attend this course.

3

訓練學生閱讀英文教科書以及以英文寫作業和作答的能力

4

培養學生在跨語言和跨文化方面的知識與涵養

3-1具備國際觀及跨文化的素養。
